Anyways, would Hideiyoshi and Tokugawa have gotten that far without
Nobuna=
ga=B4s incursions? Specially Tokuwaga, who seemed to be at the right
time, =
at the right place? Whilst I do not intend to set myself as an expert
on th=
e field (an enthusiast, rather - please bear this in mind), would it be
too=
 far from feasible bounds to hold that Tokugawa won by default (lack of
cap=
able opponents)?

Thiago
